sentences.en: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.cn: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

sentences.en: Don't you know the crushed worm will turn ? Why are you so lacking in vigilance?
sentences.cn: 你不知道困兽犹斗 吗 ?为什么这样麻痹大意?

sentences.en: He was a yellow gutless worm.
sentences.cn: 他是个胆小的、没勇气的可怜虫.

sentences.en: I had a queer sensation as if a worm was creeping down my spine.
sentences.cn: 我有一种可疑的感觉,好象有个虫子在顺着我的脊梁往下爬似的.

sentences.en: I had to worm my way out sideways from the bench in a ridiculous, undignified fashion.
sentences.cn: 我侧着身子艰难地从长凳上移开，那个样子很可笑，很不雅观。

sentences.en: I worm all my birds in early spring.
sentences.cn: 早春的时候我给我所有的鸟打虫。

sentences.en: It took me weeks to worm the facts out of him.
sentences.cn: 我花了几个星期才从他那儿套出事情的真相。

sentences.en: Running water is never stale and a door - hinge never gets worm - eaten.
She never misses a chance to worm her way into the public's hearts.
sentences.cn: 她从不放过任何博取公众欢心的机会。

sentences.en: The bird had a worm in its beak.
The early bird catches the worm.
The serious buying happens between 6 and 8am, and it is very much the case that the early bird catches the worm.
sentences.cn: 大量的购买集中在早晨6点到8点之间，那时的情况真的就是先到先得。

sentences.en: The slow-worm is in fact not a snake but a legless lizard.
sentences.cn: 蛇蜥其实不是蛇，而是无脚的蜥蜴。

sentences.en: The worm burrowed its way under the earth.
The worm was crushed under the feet.

words.tran_cn: 有虫的，虫蛀的；似虫的；卑躬屈膝的
[无脊椎]虫，[基医]蠕虫；[机]蜗杆；螺纹；小人物
使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]狡猾地混入；慢慢地爬入，钻进，设法取得
蜗轮减速机；蜗轮减速器

trans.tran_cn: 蠕虫，(动物或人体内)寄生虫
trans.tran_en: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil
